sf_crime <- read.csv("Data/SFPD_Incidents_-_from_1_January_2003.csv", header = TRUE, sep="," , stringsAsFactors = FALSE,na.strings = c("",NA,"n/a","N/A","NA")) %>% select(Category,DayOfWeek,Date,Time,PdDistrict,Location) %>% mutate(month = months(as.Date(sf_crime$Date,"%m/%d/%Y")))
